traits.appearance: wears distinctive jewelry: earrings, necklace, circlet, bracelets
traits.abilities: is powerful, brawny, and strong as an ox, but is dim-witted and slow

personality.mannerism: Constantly takes notes of things others say, or what happens around

voice.vocals: Speaks Quickly, at a Normal pitch.
voice.quirk: repeats the last word you say before responding
